transcript:
Customer: Hi, if you record your name and reason for calling, I'll see if this person is available.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Bataiye Hitesh ji, Swapnil baat kar raha hu, abhi message aaya tha aapka.
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Woh aapne check kiya GST?
Executive: GST ka bol rahe hai aap na?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: GST abhi aapka kya Rajasthan ka hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Abhi jo aap chala rahe the woh Rajasthan ka hai aur aapko uski jagah pe yeh wala karana hai. Ek minute rukna, mai check kar leta hu.
Executive: Toh do-do GST hai aapke paas? Same matlab naam se.
Customer: Ek Rajasthan ka hai aur ek Gujarat ka, Gujarat ka maine abhi naya banaya hai.
Executive: Nahi Gujarat wala aapne naya banaya hai. Haan is website ke liye banaya IndiaMART ke liye hai, taki mera corporate office hai na Ahmedabad mein. Okay?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Toh mujhe address bhi Ahmedabad hi chahiye tha toh sir ne bola tha. Achha thik hai, isme ab ek cheez bataiye mujhe, ek cheez bataiye mujhe, Ahmedabad wala jo apna GST hai, yeh hai aapke naam pe hai na? Rajasthan wala jo GST hai woh bhi aapke naam pe hai?
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Woh bhi mere naam pe hi hai.
Executive: PAN card wagera sab same hai na?
Customer: PAN card same, same hai. Koi changes nahi.
Executive: Hold kariyega.
Customer: One minute. Ji sir.
Executive: Aur yeh company ka naam bhi dono mein same hai na? Chandra Oil. Haan Chandra Oil company.
Executive: Chandra Oil.
Executive: Ek baar mai check karta hu ki GST ka yeh jo hai na, kis case mein change ho sakta hai, one minute. Dekho sir, ek baat bolu mai aapko?
Customer: Hmm. Hello. Actually mein bataiye GST sir.
Customer: Unhone agree hue the woh log.
Customer: Thik hai na? Kaun? Ki haan sir, matlab ki jab maine plan liya tha na, yeh. Sales person jo the. Yeh cheez, haan maine yeh cheez rakhi thi unke samne, maine kaha sir mai isliye lena chah raha hu. Business membership taki hai na mera address mere corporate office se abhi Ahmedabad mein chal raha hai kaam. Thik hai na? Lekin mere ko address change karna padega. Sir ke address change karna padega toh phir aapko GST number bhi Gujarat ke chahiye. Maine kaha mai naya le lunga GST number. Haan toh ho jayega aapka.
Customer: Thik hai na? Mai check, mai check kar lunga, ek minute rukiye, rukiye, rukiye.
Executive: Unhone kya bola woh toh thik hai. But abhi mai jo solution hai us pe aata hu ki abhi hogi, hoga toh kis tarike se hoga woh mai check kar raha hu. Ek minute rukna.
Executive: Prename as per GST. Aur.
Executive: Pin code change with same state change or not possible. No specific created.
Executive: City name change when pin code is already as per GST.
Executive: Ek minute sir, line pe rahiye, mai ek baar discuss karta hu team se, line pe rehna.
Customer: Bilkul, bilkul.
Executive: Pehle toh batate aap yeh cheez ki aisa bola tha unhone, aapne pehle nahi bataya mujhe?
Customer: Sir mai, mai jab se wait hi kar raha tha yeh matlab ki iska, matlab ki certificate aane wala hai.
Executive: GST aane ka.
Customer: Haan. Mai sir ek baar discuss toh kar lete, itne din se baat chal rahi hai ki aisa aisa. Pehle wali cheez. Raksha madam ko bola hua hai, woh Tiwari ji ko bola hua hai aur aap Swapnil ji baat kar raha hu. Swapnil Tiwari se baat kar raha hu, sir mujhse kaha bola aapne GST ke liye? Ek minute ruko.
Executive: Mai ek baar discuss karta hu. Yeh GST ka ek baar batana. State change hai? Sab kuch same hai.
Executive: State change hai. State change hai, PAN card same hai, GST aur company name same hai, owner same hai, sab kuch same hai.
Executive: What is state change? Kya tha unme?
Executive: Agar cancel kara do yeh purana toh ho jayega. Sir ek kaam kar sakte hai, hello?
Customer: Haan sir boliye.
Executive: Yeh jo, yeh jo apna Rajasthan wala GST cancel karwa sakte ho aap?
Customer: Meri do firm chal rahi hai na sir, mai usko surrender kaise karwa paunga?
Executive: Suspended karwa sakte ho, cancel nahi toh suspended ho sakta hai.
Customer: Nahi sir, lekin mai kaise karwaunga? Kyuki waha pe woh bhi business chal raha hai na mera sir. Do business chal rahe hai na mai, mai uske naam ke liye ek aur IndiaMART ki membership lunga na. Aise kya karunga?
Executive: Toh hai, but isme hota kya hai na ki mai, mujhe koi dikkat nahi hai, mai toh bhej dunga GST team ko ki yeh sab same hai. Baki halaki sab sahi hai aapka, same hai aur aap bhi same hai aur owner ka naam bhi same hai, PAN card bhi same hai. But ek cheez ki dikkat hai, ya toh state same hota na toh woh hand to hand kar dete. Ya toh ab is case mein kya hai na state hi change ho gaya, Rajasthan se Gujarat ho gaya. Aur dusra ek tarika yeh hai ki mai yeh dikha sakta hu ki aapka jo current wala GST tha woh cancel ho gaya hai aur naya GST aapne banwaya, sab kuch same hai lekin aapne address change kar diya hai toh aap naye state pe hai abhi. Us case mein toh mai change karwa dunga. Aap please, aap please dikha dijiye lekin woh cancel toh nahi hoga?
Executive: Cancel toh dikhana padega na sir, phir kaise dikhaunga waha pe ki cancel nahi hai, active hai? Lekin yeh, yeh cheeze sir hai na abhi aap bol rahe ho agar pehle bolta toh mai yeh cheez. Nahi toh pehle aapne bataya bhi na mujhe yeh wala ki sales person jo bhi aaye the aapke address pe. Mujhe, sir ab mai kitne dino ko bataunga batao na. Maine Negi sir ko bataya. Nahi aap ek baar yeh toh bolte ki sales, jo bhi Negi sir ka naam bata raha, bolte toh woh unhone bola hai GST ke regarding. Unhone khud bola ki nahi, isliye aap mere ko bol do jab bhi aapka GST number aaya mere ko bata dena. Dusra ek ticket bhi open karwa diya.
Customer: Achha, thik hai.
Customer: Toh pehle se hi nahi tha. Inhone batayi nahi mujhe kaha pe. Abhi bol rahe hai ki mai GST ka wait kar raha hu aur jo jinse. Cancel karwa do toh woh ho jayega na?
Executive: Nahi, abhi cancel nahi kara raha na, dikkat yahi hai.
Customer: Yeh hamari discussion pehle nahi hui thi.
Executive: Pata hi nahi.
Executive: Ek minute rukiye, lijiye baat kariye.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji sir.
Customer: Haan sir bataiye.
Executive: Sir aapne bola tha mere ko ki haan please hum jaise hi GST certificate doge hum aapke change kar lenge.
Customer: Maine bola tha? Meri toh pehli baat hai, pehli baar baat ho rahi hai. Achha aap, aap sir haan haan sir boliye sir aap boliye. Ji ji boliye. Ji ji. Boliye mai aap meri baat mai aapke samne rakhna chahta hu. Negi sir, Tiwari ji sir aur Raksha ji. Thik hai na? Toh maine unse ek baat rakhi ki yeh mera profile 14 saal purana hai. Thik hai na? Toh 14 saal se maine renew nahi kiya hua. Mere ko mere ko yahi registration, matlab yahi profile chahiye. Lekin hai na mere ko hai na aane wale samay mein mai na mai Gujarat mein office chalu kar raha hu. Thik hai na? Toh maine kaha yeh address change ho jayega? Toh phir unhone kaha haan ho jayega na. Aap badi chhot address toh address jo hai, address jaise aap agar GST pe address update karwate ho toh toh aapka aap de dena hum change, woh toh change ho jayega. Address toh change ho hi jayega na sir. Har same GST hai toh address toh change ho hi jayega. GST toh same hai na?
Customer: Nahi GST alag hai na, dono ke alag alag hai. Rajasthan wali Chandra Oil company ka alag hai aur Gujarat ki, Gujarat ke GST number Chandra Oil company ka alag hai, dono hi alag alag hai.
Customer: Thik hai na? Maine apna corporate isliye Ahmedabad mein laya hai taki isliye thoda performance achha rahe. Toh inhone yeh bola hoga, sir inhone yeh bola hoga ki agar same GST rahega address agar change ho jayega. Achha. Nahi sir aisa nahi bola. NSD walon ne bola. NSD? Unhone, unhone aise bola ki aapko naya GST lena hoga sir, koi change hoga. Thik hai, koi baat nahi, naye GST ke sath mein naya address aa jayega mera, Ahmedabad ka. Okay okay okay. Toh aap bol sakte hai. Achha NSD walon ne bola yeh? Haan toh jo Negi ji hai unhone bola sir. Negi ji ne bola, Raksha ji ne bola, phir Tiwari ji ne bola. Yeh cheeze isliye hi mai na is profile ko leke chal raha hu kyuki 14 saal purani agar koi bhi mere profile mein jayega toh unko lagega haan yeh 14 year old hai. Toh thoda performance achha lagta hai. Maine isliye yeh sab kaam kiya. Nahi toh mai sir, mai mai Ahmedabad mein office bhi kyun kholunga, mai Rajasthan mein baitha tha mai phir. Toh mai itna kharcha kyun kiya yaha pe? Hmm hmm hmm. Samajh rahe ho na? Haan. Yeh. Meri dono hi firm chal rahi hai, mai usko kyun surrender karunga sir? 14 saal purani mera GST number chal raha hai. Toh usko bhi. Haan toh active, toh active toh ek hi rahega na sir. Agar woh change hota hai toh active IndiaMART pe toh ek hi chalegi paid service. Haan lekin yeh, mai kya bol raha hu, haan toh meri is pe kar dijiye na, yeh naya GST daal ke mere ko update kar dijiye. GST toh pura change hi hai na? Ek cheez hai option, aisa hoga ki aisa ho sakta hai hamare paas option ki isko jaise humne band karwa denge aur approval pe dekh leta hu ek baar receipt transfer, paisa transfer hoga yeh ho sakta hai sir. Yeh bilkul hi band ho jayega. Aapka IndiaMART pe jo iska paid subscription hai jo current wala woh bilkul hi band ho jayega sir. Nahi toh phir maine 16 saal woh bataya na band kar dega na sir. 14 years. Toh sir toh ek hi, sir toh paid subscription toh ek hi chalega na. Jo naya wala agar address pe hum GST pe le rahe hai toh toh dikh kaise dikhayega sir. Dono ek cheez kaise ho sakta hai? Agar GST toh naya hi dikhayega na. Toh aise kabhi bhi aap karwate kaise bhi karwate. Agar naya GST hum le rahe hai, naye GST pe agar paid service hum transfer karwayenge toh usi hisab se dikhayega na waha pe jo. Meri profile toh 16 saal purani batayegi na? Kaise profile 16 saal purani hum. Profile toh naya hi banega na sir. 16 saal se kaise dikhayegi? Sir toh phir mera matlab hi kya hua sir. Yeh toh after all sir mere ko sir har cheez mein mere ko kyun chhupa ke rakhi yeh cheeze. Nahi sir pehle sir pehle sir ne aisa bola kyun nahi sir, why not? Aap mere ko bhejiye na sir, jab bhi aapka ban ke aayega hum turant aapka address change kar lenge. Maine bataya tha bola ki sir mai Ahmedabad mein aa raha hu. Are sir Ahmedabad ka address GST hoga toh. Wahi mai aapko keh raha hu, agar usne bola hoga Negi ji ne address. Wahi mai aapko keh raha hu, address change hota hai sir. Agar GST pura hi agar change ho jayega sir. Thik hai. Toh aapka waha pe change hota hai na sir. Ek baar aapka naya wala GST aa gaya kya? Naya wala. Haan aa gaya na. GST certificate bhej diya na. Ek baar ticket pe try karo ki ho pata hai ki nahi. Ek baar check karo, check karwa leta hu ek baar sir. Mujhe haan aap dijiye. Aur aapke paas Negi unka Negi ji ka number hai? Haan hai na? Haan ek baar call unko kijiye ki aapne bola tha abhi mera naya GST aa gaya aapne commit kiya tha mera sahi karwa. Ek baar unko bhi connect karo. Unko, unko ka message aaya, unko ka message aaya mere paas mein. Unhone bola ke aisa bola unhone ke yes I will call you tomorrow morning aur office let me check. Thik hai. Haan bolo ki please mujhe urgent basis pe karwaiye aapne mujhe commit kiya tha. Mujhe revert kijiye. Aap karo ek baar mai aapko. Hum bhi unko, hum bhi unhe connect karte hai. Aap bhi ek baar karo sir. Thik hai. Haan bolo phir aaj toh sir woh office mein nahi hai na. Mai dusre toh yeh hai. Negi ji aaj office mein nahi hai. Woh aapko, aap na, aap screenshot bhi bhej dijiye woh Negi ji ka jo chat hai ek baar bhej dijiye hame. Mai hum bhi, hum bhi karte hai na unko confront karte hai ki aisi commitment kyun di. Aap bhejo details bhejo. Thik hai. Aur aur Tiwari ji ne bhi bola mere ko. Raksha ji ne bola. Mujhe bhejo na. Sabhi bola. Sabka, sabka confrontation bhejo. Matlab aap WhatsApp chat bhejiye ek baar mai unko confront karta hu, mail daalta hu unko. Maine sabko aise toh chat pe toh nahi bola hai, sabko phone pe bola hai na sir. Nahi nahi abhi, abhi, abhi aap keh rahe ho na ki unhone bola ki mai let me check. Toh woh wala sara kuch bhejiye detail bhejiye Negi ji ka. Haan bhejiye WhatsApp karwaiye. Hum karte hai ek baar confront unko dekhte hai. Nahi nahi inhi ko bhej dijiye Swapnil Raksha kisi ko bhi bhej dijiye. Raksha ji ko bhejta hu, thik hai. Kisi ko bhi bhej dijiye aap. Aur baki mai check karwata hu ek baar ki ho pata hai ki nahi. Agar aisa hi, aisa hi hai aapko, thik hai na? Agar mere ko GST number aap nahi change kar rahe toh maine aapko. Nahi nahi jo cheeze hai GST mai aapko batata hu, yeh sab option hai. Do teen options hote hai. Iske antargat hi hum change karte hai. Jaise ki agar same state hota hai address change karwana hota hai toh same GST pe ho jata hai toh hum change kar dete hai within a second. Agar state change ho gaya toh naya profile create karwate hai. Yeh sare alag alag scenario hai sir teen char. Agar unhone commit kiya hai koi cheez toh discuss karna banta hai sir. Woh hamari internal hai. Aap bhej do unka ki haan inhone bola hai aur phir baki mai unko karta hu connect. Thik hai? Bas bas. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to change GST details.

- Customer says executive committed to changing GST.

- Customer concerned about profile age after GST change.



Resolution:

- Executive will check options for GST change.

- Executive asked for screenshots of commitments.

- Executive will confront the team about commitment.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to send screenshots of commitments.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- gst, address change, profile, commitment, sales team
